google_reviews.author: Erika Redzinak
google_reviews.review: We moved in at the end of July and Kendall and Tim have been great. Of course with any new apartment, things are already chipping off like the cheap paint on the back door and interior doors. But regardless, we love our place and being near the park and everything else! We have enjoyed the community space upstairs, too!

google_reviews.author: Harjit
google_reviews.review: We moved in early September 2024. Tim and Payton provided prompt and courteous service. We scheduled a tour and Tim followed up with us in the morning for our scheduled tour. During application process and lease signing, Tim was quick to respond and also followed up for any questions. It was quick and smooth process with user friendly system. Management does a great job, and building is new and in good shape. It is a quiet place and is close to all amenities. It is located next to Cordata park - with walking trails, pickleball and basketball court and nice play area for kids. An ideal place.

summary.text:
Good

Celestia Apartments have a fair share of positive feedback, particularly in terms of location and general upkeep. Some residents appreciate its proximity to various amenities such as parks and trails, making it a favorable place for those who value outdoor activities. The community space upstairs has been mentioned positively, adding to the pleasant living experience. However, minor issues such as cheap paint chipping off were noted, but these did not significantly affect the overall satisfaction of the residents. The peaceful and quiet environment seems to be a common theme in the user reviews, making it an appealing choice for residents seeking tranquility.

Great

The management team at Celestia Apartments receives high praise from residents for their professionalism and helpfulness. Many reviews highlight the seamless and efficient move-in process facilitated by the staff, with names like Tim and Jaime frequently mentioned for providing exceptional service. The management’s attention to queries and their quick response times have been noted as exemplary, adding to the property's allure. Additionally, the property is appreciated for its aesthetic appeal and well-maintained condition, earning it the title of the best apartment experience for several tenants.

Located near vibrant hubs and attractions, Celestia Apartments offers convenience and accessibility to its residents. Being just off main roads allows for quick commutes to shopping centers and grocery stores, making daily routines hassle-free. The building itself is noted for its cleanliness and orders despite being pet-friendly, particularly for dog owners who enjoy the nearby park with its trail loops. Residents not only appreciate the comfort and aesthetics of their apartments but also the strong sense of community fostered by a responsive management team.

Bad

While the overall sentiment about Celestia Apartments is positive, there are minor grievances mentioned that could affect the living experience for some. One recurring comment is about the absence of trash bins in certain common areas, which residents find inconvenient. Such concerns, though not major, highlight a need for improvements in amenities provided within the complex. Despite loving the surroundings and the general upkeep, tenants feel that addressing these small issues could enhance their satisfaction.

Ugly

There is a lack of significant negative feedback in the user reviews concerning Celestia Apartments. No major complaints or instances of mismanagement have surfaced, which suggests that the living environment is predominantly favorable. The absence of detailed criticisms or recurring serious issues might reflect the management’s effective handling of the property and resident needs. As a result, there were limited negative aspects to highlight in this section, indicating a well-run apartment community.
